page.title: 11FREE CHURCHES IN HENFIELD.
page.content: Corpus Christi by Samuel. The Church that I go to is Corpus Christi. It is a Roman Catholic Church. It is very modern being built in 1974. It is an interesting though small Church. It can seat about one hundred people. The Church has a wooden altar and it has eight altar servers. It has a big window of stained glass at the back of it. The original church is used as a hall which we go to after mass for coffee. Rehoboth Baptist Chapel by Michelle. The Chapel is quite small. When you go in you go through a green door. If you look straight ahead there is a big kind of box where the preacher stands. There are many long benches as well. I go to Sunday School. We pray. Our teacher talks about a story from the Bible. We sing. We go to classes and have questions on the story.
